website_summaries.verdict: The ridged grip helps you to hold onto these with wet, snowy gloves, and the 3-pack means more kids can have fun.
pros: Comes in a 3-pack, with yellow, red, and blue snowball makers
Stores easily after your battles in a snowman drawstring bag
Snowballs fit well into a child's hand
cons: Some reports that the 2 sides do not line up correctly, making it difficult to create perfect snowballs

customer_reviews.title: Works for this old grandma!
customer_reviews.text: Too much fun! I bought these for my 30+ year old son and 3 year old grandson. The first time we tried them, the snow was dry and fluffy and they did not work. The moment I heard that we were having a heavy, wet snow, I headed out doors. In seconds, I had all these perfect snowballs! I love this...may have to order more for Christmas gifts next year.
customer_reviews.author: Red Sock Mama

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for a 4 year old girl to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough for a 4 year old girl to use. She made 10 snowballs in just two mins. And two minutes later, all the snowballs are shooting on me. We had a great fun snowball fighting.
customer_reviews.author: acheyueliang

customer_reviews.title: These things are so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: A year ago my hubs blasted me in the face with a snow ball, so being the forgiving wife that I am I wanted to get something to really teach him a lesson. So me and the kids packed these in the car making sure he never saw them. Then we went to the snow and me and the kids sat innocently pretending to play in the snow and hubs walked over and lets just say we never ran out of snow balls. These things are so much fun and your fingers don't feel like they are falling off. I am sure I had more fun with these than my kids...lol.
customer_reviews.author: sjm357

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after the blizzard of December 2018. Needless to say, after buying these it did not snow again. Feb 2020 was the first chance we had to use these and they did great! No comment on the longevity of these items as we've only used them once, but they held up in storage for a year!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Millbarge

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for big snow days!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and makes perfect snowballs almost every time! A tiny bit of effort to use with only one or two inches of snow but super easy to use with a lot of snow. Definitely worth the money! Makes snow ball fights super fun with only a few minutes of prep time to build up everyone's ammo :)
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Snow day fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great toy for my kids. They loved making snowballs with them without getting their hands cold and wet. They have also used to make mud balls and sand balls since we live in the south and dont get much snow day if any.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Work good for fresh snow
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 3 pack. On attempting to make 1st snowball broke 1. Was more careful after that and they worked fine. You need fresh/soft snow (no ice crust).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: awesome fun tool for kids (and adults)
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome fun!! super easy to use, my 5 yr old was having a world of fun running around making snowballs. it literally takes 1 second to scoop up some snow and clap it closed thats all you need to make a perfectly round compact snowball!
customer_reviews.author: emeric

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas gift for my kids. Is what it is, does what it says. Used once, then it hasn’t snowed again, so I can’t speak to durability/sturdiness over time.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Haluska

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for the bestie
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend who is a step mom... she loved that she got something she could do with her step son or on her own to make snow balls to play with her dogs. Pretty nifty :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Clamp wouldn't close
customer_reviews.text: Package came and was very excited to use this for the snow! One of them, the clamp wouldn't close!! It's not made really well.
customer_reviews.author: Esther S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to a ski trip with my 1st grader son, and played with this set in the snow. They make perfect snow balls and we had so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: bokchoy

customer_reviews.title: Snow Balls Galore
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids had a blast with these over the winter. Lots of snowball fights between neighbors and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute snowball maker. Bought for my granddaughters. My kids used to have them when they were young and they were very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Chere M.

customer_reviews.title: Snowball must
customer_reviews.text: My boys turned into buddy the elf. It was so fast and easy to make snowballs.
customer_reviews.author: WHS

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved these!! They make a perfect snowball - even when there isn't fresh powder and harder to grab with hands/gloves. They were a huge hit! Bag even came in handy when trying to keep them together.
customer_reviews.author: Christy M

customer_reviews.title: If your ever in a snowball fight this toy is for you
customer_reviews.text: Make snowballs to defend your newly made snow fort from enemy invasions.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved using these to make the perfect snowballs on our day out to the snow. Prevents freezing your hands and they really work well to make the perfect snowball.
customer_reviews.author: Thepixiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for snow
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit with my niece and nephew even though we don't have snow yet! They chased their dad around like crabs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gifts for grandchildren I am sure they will love them
customer_reviews.author: Nanna Rondeau

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved these in the snow and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Gearys7

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - even my 2 year old granddaughter can make snowballs now!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and definitely needed more for the grandkids. Even the 2 year old can make snowballs now.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K.

customer_reviews.title: Snowball fights have evolved
customer_reviews.text: Easy snowball maker. You will be the víctor in any snowball fight if you have one of these handy
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for snow play
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to play in constant VT snow - the kids love them. They've held up and made many snowballs!!! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: T.O.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright colors do they won’t get lost in the snow. Easy to use. Make great snowballs fast. Carry bag is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Susie’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amaz-balls!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They make great snowballs & we have hours of fun with them. They make the perfect snowballs!
customer_reviews.author: Brande M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is so simple to use and makes a nice snowball that fits comfortable in a child's hand
customer_reviews.text: This is so simple to use and makes a nice snowball that fits comfortable in a child's hand. We have had so much fun outside playing with these cool toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Poor Chinese kids
customer_reviews.text: For the kid that is not smart enough to use his or her hands. I hope the kid that made this in China knows how to make a snowball
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Surived a few snow trips with my 3 and 6 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Makes awesome snow balls! Easy for age 4-5 yo kids to use!
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: These are really great snowball makers - and it is always good to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really great snowball makers - and it is always good to have more than one to share with friends!
customer_reviews.author: KB Rob

customer_reviews.title: Snowballs for dayyyyyys!!!
customer_reviews.text: Helped them build enough ammo to beat daddy in a snowball fight ;)
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper!

customer_reviews.title: grandsons
customer_reviews.text: got this for my grandsons and they loved them worked great
customer_reviews.author: Debra Davies

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the quality of this product. Not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sieg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making snowballs, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy plastic, they line up and match the way they are supposed to! My 4 year old loves loves loves these we won’t go another winter without them!
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love these. Making snowballs, now, is quick and easy. They are very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Precarious

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the kids on a trip to Colorado and they were a huge hit. Nice little toys.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Only for small kids
customer_reviews.text: Okay for young ones, but breaks too easily for use with any strength or heavy snow
customer_reviews.author: J Kuczenski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, great price. Used them all winter for epic snow ball fights.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: They work great and are
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for all the special kids on my holiday list and they were a hit! They work great and are durable
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Boehm

customer_reviews.title: Good gifts for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kids might break them pretty quick, easy to snap in half.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey faeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snowballs
customer_reviews.text: These were great in the snow! Loved the convenient carrying bag to transport in our suitcase to a ski resort. The snowball makers held up in our luggage and made perfectly round snowballs each time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I wish I had them when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Barry

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great for snowball wars, made 100 in less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

 Perfect for Kids Making Quick Snowballs and Getting Ultimate Snowball Fighting.

 Not Only For Snow, It Can Be Used with Mixed Wet Sand, Mud and Bath Tombs.
